storyInfo: Theresis faces Priestess in the Assimilated Universe and wrestles partial control of Originium from her. Badly harmed by the efforts of Theresis and Theresa, Priestess fell into slumber, but now she has awoken.

attributes.content: <p=1>Assimilated Universe</><p=2>When 'she' awakens</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Theresis falls in the ocean of information. The massive quantity buffets him, assimilating his cognition.
He can feel his mind grow slow, but he still tries to follow the guidance left behind by Theresa—
Guided by his sword, the information flow reconstructed by Theresa clashes with the preexisting one.
The massive collision lasts only an instant.
The surface begins to surge. Then, the sea splits open, as if sliced by a sharp blade.
A dark abyss appears in the Assimilated Universe. The sea of data stirs and roils.
Waves crashing against waves, drowning out one another.
Even as his mind grows numb, Theresis can sense the will gazing upon him weaken rapidly.
Your plan worked, Theresa.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Sever their control over Amnannam and seize it—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: But suddenly, all the violent scenes come to a screeching halt.
She opens her eyes and sees the small, frail creature.
(Unknown language) Connection... unstable.
(Unknown language) —It's you?
(Unknown language) Your actions surprise me.
attributes.name: Calm Voice

attributes.content: (Unknown language) ...'Theresa' and 'Theresis'.
attributes.name: Calm Voice

attributes.content: Theresis does not comprehend the space before him. Perhaps it is simply another illusion of a dying mind—
Until he hears a familiar language that he can understand.
Ah, but perhaps this was the result that one wanted to see?
attributes.name: Calm Voice

attributes.content: Your intentions are as easy to decipher as your language.
attributes.name: Calm Voice

attributes.content: The evolution of Terra had brought many surprises... a shame.
attributes.name: Calm Voice

attributes.content: You think we failed.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Then why do you hide and refuse to show yourself?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: He meditatively swings his sword, guiding the chaotic information through the pure-white space...
Falsehoods.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You've implemented a backdoor in my project and restricted my access.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The data tells me I'm losing this piece of Originium. My attempts at maintenance have been in vain.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Impressive. Your rash actions have borne fruit.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: There is nothing physically imposing to the voice whispering about failure before Theresis.
But this simply serves to make him more wary.
Your arrogance reminds me of someone.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Someone who deceived me. There is more than one evil spirit of a bygone age.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... I see you've met.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Then let me introduce myself.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Priestess. Linguist, and colleague to Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Theresis cannot care less who Priestess is.
Priestess or evil spirit, it makes no difference to him.
He clutches his sword tightly. He will find a way to break through.
You are anxious to defy a reality that you cannot perceive, Theresis.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You were much calmer when you plotted with {@nickname} on the border of Kazdel.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You were watching...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Watching? No.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I have long lost the energy and passion to observe the evolution of a newborn civilization.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: All I did was look up the data newly added to Originium, and checked some information that interested me.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The expansion of Originium is a consensus between me and {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The current circumstances of Terra have somewhat differed from our predictions, but it remains on track.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I admit to being surprised by your attempt to retake this Originium, but the duty of it will be fulfilled, no matter how you struggle.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You can believe what you want, creator of Originium.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You believe that Originium is immovable, but she opened a path here, and liberated the myriad souls.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: She was not the first to resist, and I will not be the last. Someone will stand before you—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Until there is none left to toy with our fate.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: 'Fate'... do you continue to believe that Originium stands opposed to the fate of your civilization?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: If you truly understand the history of your people, have you ever questioned why you have evolved in our likeness?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You do not understand what you are resisting.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Theresis observes his surroundings. He is certain that he is still inside Originium.
The nature of what makes up this place is no different from the tower that Theresa weaved—it is information reconstructed.
Theresa has left him the key. He is sure he can put an end to this enigma.
You noticed.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You do not have a real physical form. We're still in that ocean.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: In the language of Originium, reality and falsehood are not polar opposites.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: When I first created this language, I wanted it to decipher the ultimate question that we had been unable to answer, despite all our efforts.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: It.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: {@nickname} once had hope for the beings on this land... guiding them to evolve and seek hope through Originium, giving them a chance to face It, perhaps even overcome It.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: But they are doomed to despair.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: 'Teekaz'. You were not part of the plan, but you became the species most affected by Originium. An accident.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I must applaud your courage for standing here.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: An accident...? Is this how you summarize our fate?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You're certainly alike, Priestess.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You call the fates you toy with a gift of hope, millennia of suffering a necessary sacrifice.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: But {@nickname} was honest, at least.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: His sword pierces falsehood, but the space on the other side—
Nothing changed?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Theresis closes his eyes and raises his sword.
Your violence is meaningless.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: If you didn't care whether this pathetic race of mine can seize its own fate, you should have eliminated me already.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You're still weak after awakening from a long dream, are you not, Presence?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: He lunges without hesitation.
The sword-wave cuts through the figure, disappearing without a sound into the pale white wall in the distance.
I said, this is meaningless.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Another strike.
I've always wondered—what exactly is the difference between you, the self-proclaimed creators, and us?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Theresis holds nothing back. The white wall begins to crack.
You have not brought everything to a standstill.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You just wanted to buy more time, or simply to mock the struggles of a pathetic race...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Suit yourself, Priestess.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Once again, Theresis senses the surging tide of information, remnants of the broken tower that Theresa weaved.
Theresis swings again.
Golden seawater shatters the pale wall, rushing into this seemingly boundless white space.
The tide swallows all that it sees, but parts before the figure of Priestess...
Like a static comet, leaving behind a black tail of calm in the sea of surging fury.
Your connection to the Originium is weakening. You are fading away.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Continuing to process this disorganized data is a waste of energy.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The waves converge upon the last area, slowly submerging Priestess's figure.
They also close in upon Theresis.
Is this the end that you sought?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The Sarkaz data has corrupted part of the Assimilated Universe. The data has been deleted, but I do not have time right now to repair the rewritten structures.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You can 'survive' in the Assimilated Universe in another form.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Survive?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I came to pass judgment upon the gods.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Sarkaz swings his sword at the creator one last time, before the torrent of information engulfs him.
And there I was, thinking that all I had to do—after I find a successor—was hand out candies to the children.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: You have never proclaimed such a revelation before.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Incoming data... Originium...
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: (Unknown language) A warning, or yet another swan song of hope?
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Where are you, kindred? What have you encountered?
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: The wind brushes past the throne. The sovereign's gaze moves away from the depths of the void outside his domain.
This music exists outside of order. How did it invade my Pavillon, my Leithanien?
attributes.name: Witch King

attributes.content: The traces of genesis?
attributes.name: Witch King

attributes.content: Silence is broken.
Priestess's figure, shattered by the golden waves of information, disappears without a trace.
The sea of data dashes against Theresis even more furiously.
His mind grows crowded. His body begins to crack.
The waves of information take away the blood that flows from his wounds. Originium crystals multiply in every cell...
Theresis is completely inundated.
Blood-red seawater gushes from the bottomless abyss, melting into the golden sea.
The sea of data in the Assimilated Universe turns a dark red, like blood, the color of the Sarkaz.
Finally, a tiny figure rises from the sea.
We took control of Amnannam, Theresa.
attributes.name: Weak Voice

attributes.content: I can feel the direction that the waves flow now, and the massive amounts of data that I cannot comprehend—
attributes.name: Weak Voice

attributes.content: He wants to share his joy, but there is only the sound of the waves in the boundless void.
He can no longer hear even his own heartbeat. There is only him here.
There is no longer any meaning in staying here.
He will return alone to Terra, to the land that belongs to him—
The rhombus in the void grows faint and broken...
Priestess's consciousness once again falls into slumber.
The spread of Originium has been far slower than expected, and she has unexpectedly lost part of her control over it.
Two Terrans, a frail and overlooked race.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I'm starting to understand why you're so interested in them... {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: As her consciousness fades into darkness, she turns her gaze to the land known as Terra...
She sees the one they call Doctor walking with the Cautus and AMa-10 into the dark passage that leads to the underground throne room—
She sees the city of Londinium cry out in pain in the fires of war—
...She sees death—
A disintegrating Cautus, whose information is melting into the Assimilated Universe's sea of data—
Then, she reaches out.
(Unknown language) And that was the last time you saw Priestess?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Yes.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Unknown language) I still have many unanswered questions. Time is no longer my major concern.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Do you not miss your home, traveler?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: 'Miss.'
—The Cautus answered this question many times when she lived on the ship that housed the gods.
There is no future in the fragments of time reconstructed from information.
Her best friends soon forget her existence entirely.
She can know all there it is to them, but she will never truly be part of life here.
'I'm just a traveler lucky enough to catch a glimpse of the distant past.'
(Unknown language) I'm having another learning session with Presence.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Are you sure you don't want to come and talk to her?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Unknown language) You seem eager to resolve our conflict, Hierda, but I'm afraid I must decline.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: They will not change.
They are simply recreations of data.
(Unknown language) Very well.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: The Cautus looks out beyond the porthole and counts silently. When the count reaches thirty, life from the star will once again shine upon the surface of the broken planet.
It's breath-taking, no matter how many times I see it...
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Life and death emerging at the same time—
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: A scene that she had never seen on that land. A scene that she does not wish her brethren to see.
In the blink of an eye, the Cautus finds herself back on that pale soil.
Priestess welcomes her with a smile.
Have you found your answer?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The Cautus shakes her head.
Where are you going?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Terra. Your home.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I want to give you a choice, Hierda.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You can stay, learn the knowledge that you thirst for, and find answers to the questions in your heart.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Or, I can send you back home.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Home...? To Terra?!
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: However, it may mean forsaking forever the chance to find those answers.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: What's more, you will find that you have become very different from your erstwhile kin. It will bring you even more pain.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I will respect your decision, Hierda.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I, I—
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: At the same time, you step into the space within the rift.
(Angry roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Did PRTS bring us out here?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's not that simple. We are the only ones here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The deck is completely silent.
You turn around and notice the absence of the elite operators and Ascalon—
No. Massive amounts of Originium dust. Protect yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Protect the Doctor, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit! Beneath our feet!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The deck is crystallizing rapidly. At this rate...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black Originium dust accumulates on the deck. Tiny Originium clusters grow like wild grass.
You can see them spreading as far as one's eyes can reach, gleaming enchantingly in the sun.
Warn all operators still on Rhodes Island to be prepared for Catastrophe, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
Amiya
attributes.content: Understood.

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: I'm not getting through! All communications have failed—
attributes.joined: Understood.I'm not getting through! All communications have failed—

attributes.content: The sight before you is inconceivable, different from any Catastrophe that you have witnessed before.

attributes.options: The Originium expands at an impossible pace.

attributes.content: You look down at the deck, now completely covered in Originium, and see only your shadow.
Doctor—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You turn around to see a stunned look on Kal'tsit's face.
You follow her gaze. Far in the distance on the deck, a small formation of black Originium is growing slowly towards the sky.
You see a faint white figure on every facet of the crystal.
A figure not unfamiliar to you—
The black Originium rain suddenly grows more intense.
It almost feels like the large black raindrops are not falling from the sky, but rushing from the ground towards the heavens.
They refract the sunlight, drawing colorful lines in the sky—
All the colors you see begin to converge and weave into a white curtain, glistening with rainbow colors, slowly descending.
A pure, pristine white, gentle draping over the Originium crystal on the deck—
A beautiful figure stands upon the crystal.
Black crystal retreats from her legs, and white light puts a layer of clothing on her.
Heaven and earth, white and black, and—
She looks upon the land that has long become unfamiliar to her.
Long time no see.
attributes.name: Priestess
